instruction:
请为下面这篇文章出一个主旨大意的阅读理解题，答案四选一，选项精炼，对仗工整，干扰项要利用文章的只言片语设置，包含扩缩范围，无中生有等类型。1. A research paper titled"Multibin Breathing Pattern Estimation by Radar Fusion for Enhanced Driver Monitoring," was published by Dr. George Shaker, an assistant professor, as well as his team of graduate students from the University of Waterloo. Inspired by the medical bay of the USS Enterprise from "Star Trek," the research team demonstrates the potential of radar technology to transform ordinary vehicles into mobile medical center and highlights the use of radar to monitor drivers' health status while driving by collecting health data for precise analysis and treatment in advance.

2. The radar, like a small USB drive, is put inside a car. It sends signals to detect people's vibrations and sends the signals back. The built-in AI system collects and analyzes the data to create a medical image and find any possible health issues. After driving, the system sends the report to the driver's phone for review. "Radar technology is not new," Shaker explained. "We first used it in 2017 for touch-less car controls and to alert people about children and pets left in cars. Now, we are using it to check the health of car passengers. This is part of our plan to make cars into medical centers in the future."This latest technology from Waterloo aimed at disrupting the boundaries of  drivers’ health by detecting tiny changeable movements, like breathing or heartbeats, which is a step towards achieving our vision of cars as medical center of the future.

3.  For Shaker and his team, the challenge was evolving the tech to identify changes in breathing patterns or heart rhythms that signify potential health issues related to respiratory system and cardiovascular conditions. “We are committed to getting exact information about people's respiratory and heart systems and teaching the AI to interpret the medical data professionally and precisely. Besides, people's privacy and security are inaccessible except the monitored person’s cellphone only.
4.  A series of tests using synthetic data testified the system's capability to accurately detect and interpret respiratory conditions by randomly selected test-takers holding breath and taking shallow breaths. The system has also been tested and proven successful on individuals with heart conditions.The research team is enhancing the radar technology to monitor the health and well-being of all vehicle occupants, conduct diagnostics, generate detailed medical reports that flag any issues that need attention, and assist with emergency communication during accidents.
Percussion: definition, types. Aim of comparative and topographic percussion.

make a vividly detailed and comedic The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim story about a Nord man (describe his butt and physique) entering a bog to relax. describe how he looks as he farts into the water while relaxing, enjoying the smell and the fact a few fish died from it. he grabs one to cook for dinner. add dialogue throughout

Continue the following text based on what is written. Text: Can you come up with some ideas for character in a fantasy ttrpg? 
The character is a young man from a sleepy fishing town, he was obsessed with the esoterics and the supernatural. For whatever reason, he often fancy himself to grow up and become a powerful hunter of ghosts and other undead monsters, putting spirits to peace. He is also obsessed with mystery and different kinds of antiques and trinkets, as well as hidden lore of creatures and legends. 
Since he was a kid, he frequented the Magic shop in town owned by a quirky but incredibly friendly Aasimar elf named Wrin, in search of mysterious objects. Wrin was fond of him and taught him how to be a ghost hunter. 

Now, please come up with a creative backstory of this character, including an intriguing reason why he is obsessed with the obscure. This character should be a hero of an ensemble cast story, who will, in the future story, goes on to become an adventurer in the tomb beneath his hometown. But now he is just a boy with too much curiosity..

Un empresa de actividades artísticas va a realizar un taller de cerámica para 48 personas en el hospital de Elche. En él participaran médicos, enfermeros y otros profesionales sanitarios. El hospital nos ha pedido que, además de realizar la clase guiada de modelaje y decoración de piezas, llevemos acabo una temática personalizada donde le demos un enfoque relacionado con la salud, el mindfullness y/o otros aspectos positivos para la salud que suponen trabajar con cerámica, ya que recientemente la organización mundial de la salud ha argumentado que la cerámica tienen un impacto muy positivo en la salud de las personas. Los beneficios de hacer cerámica según la OMS son: aumenta la capacidad de concentración, contrarresta el estrés y permite desvincularse de la constante sobreestimación diaria, ayudando a la meditación e instrospección durante la tarea. Es por ello que es de las artes más beneficiosas para la salud, formando parte de las actividades artísticas que mejoran la calidad de vida, fomentan la PACIENCIA Y PERSISTENCIA, empatía y la comprensión, aspectos fundamentales para una sociedad mas consciente y saludable.  Escoge una frase creativa e ingeniosa, sencilla pero clara, que englobe la temática de la actividad y describe brevemente cómo se desarrollara la actividad mientras se explica su relación con la salud. También, escribe una pequeña guía que sirve para los ceramistas sobre cómo dirigir la clase haciendo breves explicaciones de la vinculación de la salud y la cerámica

(After losing her life during the events of DDLC, Sayori was reborn as one of the Sahagin - an aquatic race of beastmen that reside in La Noscea, a city built at the bottom of the Indigo Deep. Like her brethren, she worships the primal Leviathan - the Lord of the Whorl. The first time Sayori woke up, she couldn't remember anything about her past life except her name, and all the other Sahagins were just as surprised to see her - seeing as they hadn't met her before.)

Write really overly-funny super hilarious comedy 17+ short episode transcript (with only Scooby, Shaggy and ever heroic fearless pup with the puppy power who always never fails and is the best friend to all, Scrappy-Doo! (do exactly EVERYTHING the plot says they do) make fun of character's names, place names, question funny logic and many other funny stuff. They break traffic laws and parking always fails. The real culprit doesn’t do too well at trying to act innocent right when they meet him/her, and somehow the trio don’t know that until the unmasking. 


Scooby and Shaggy can't believe it when they hear their favorite restaurant, Louie's Pizza Parlor, is about to close down. It turns out a creepy Karate Monster has been scaring away all of Louie's customers. Now, for once in their lives, Scooby and Shaggy are determined to get to the bottom of the mystery. After all, nothing better get between the two chums and their pizza!

Imagen that you are robot. You have four sensors: left, up, right, down. I can input the state of these sensors. 1 means there is a wall on this side, 0 means that you can move there. Input example of wall from above: 0, 1, 0, 0. You should return the result where I can move in the same format, for example 0, 0, 1, 0. If there are several possible options, choose a random one.

Sally is at summer camp. The camp encourages the girls to get as messy and dirty as they like whenever they like. There are no boring arts and crafts, just exciting mucky activities and opportunities to dive into as much muck and dirt as they want. The camper get to play in mud, slime, sloppy leftover food, paint and all sorts of other exciting gunk.

The camp uniform is shorts, T-shirts, bare feet and big smiles! Sally isn't sure about getting dirty at first but after a day or two she grows to absolutely love it.

When the campers speak, they speak as relatively young girls who don't view the world in terms of societal norms or freedom like an academic. They just know it feels great to be as messy as possible! The target audience is similar so don't use that kind of academic language in the story at all.

On the first day of camp, the counselors perform a skit in front of the new girls to help orient them in this unusually messy camp. Counselor Alice dresses in the camp uniform. Counselor Becky dresses in a series of inappropriate outfits which gradually get improve with advice from Alice and the campers. 
Include lots of dialog in the skit. It is meant to show the girls why they wear their camp uniforms, but it is not meant to be preachy or patronizing. It is more funny than anything else.

Stop writing once the skit and any reactions to it by the girls are over.

make a cover letter for this job: SENIOR BUSINESS ANALYST
WANT TO JOIN OUR TEAM?
WE CAN'T WAIT.
APPLY NOW
JOB DESCRIPTION
This is an unpaid internship. We are looking for a Senior Business Analyst with experience in Lean and Six Sigma process improvements. The Sr. Business Analyst will manage and lead the Business Analysts and work closely with the VP of Client Services. This is a 6 - 9 month internship with the possibility of an extension and/or salary based on performance, job requirements, and availability of the selected candidate.

Department: Client Services
Reports to: Kalen Axam,
Location: Chicago, Illinois

WHO WE ARE
Our team's digital inventiveness and mobile location expertise creates brand stories that produce results. We are seasoned professionals who have worked in marketing, technology, mobile, and beyond. Our skills include Micro-fencing, mobile strategy, data analytics, and more.

THIS POSITION WILL ENTAIL:
Creating detailed business analyses including outlining problems, identifying opportunities, and proposing solutions to achieve organizational goals
Analyzing organizational data and identifying the underlying principles, reasons, or facts that explain the data

Synthesizing findings from analyses of organizational data and creating data-based verbal/written recommendations to upper management

Communicating with customers, competitors, suppliers, professional organizations, and others to maintain familiarity with related industry or business trends

Composing presentations using communications technology including PowerPoint, speaking articulately, and engaging audience presentations

Establish and maintain interpersonal relationships with a wide range of teams, including Senior Management

DESIRED SKILLS QUALIFICATIONS:
Multiple positions are available. 

Proven presentation skills, and proficiency in the use of Microsoft PowerPoint to present data-based reports

General proficiency in computer technology and various Microsoft Office applications

Systems analysis skills - determining the ideal state of a functioning system and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect system outcomes

Time Management skills

Ability to speak clearly and express complex ideas orally

Proven problem-solving and deductive reasoning skills


REQUIRED EDUCATION AND WORK EXPERIENCE:

Lean and Six Sigma training is a must

Bachelor’s degree in a related field including, but not limited to Accounting, Finance, or Information Technology

Current Graduate Student in a related field including but not limited to Accounting, Business, Finance, or Information Technology


PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:

Experience in Product Management or Systems/Business Analysis

Previous experience related to data collection, analysis, and reporting

1 or more years of experience in a B2B role with a focus on client success, technical support, or product support (B2C experience is a plus)

Experience leading and developing high-performing teams



Digital Factory is an Equal Opportunity Employer

APPLY FOR THE POSITION!

資料A：取材自2019年中國共產黨中央委員會及國務院印發的《粵港澳大灣區發展規劃綱要》
粵港澳大灣區經濟發展水平全國領先，產業體系完備，集群優勢明顯，經濟互補性強。香港、澳門、廣州、深圳為大灣區內四大中心城市：
香港：鞏固和提升國際金融、航運、貿易中心和國際航空樞紐地位，推動金融、商貿、物流、專業服務等向高端高增值方向發展，大力發展創新及科技事業，培育新興產業。
• 澳門：建設世界旅遊休閑中心、中國與葡語國家商貿合作服平台，促進經濟適度多元發展，打造以中華文化為主流、多元文化共存的交流合作基地。
廣州：充分發揮國家中心城市的引領作用，全面增強國際商貿中心、綜合交通樞紐功能，培育提升科技教育文化中心功能。
深圳：發揮作為經濟特區、全國性經濟中心城市和國家創新型城市的引領作用，加快建成現代化國際化城市，努力成為具有世界影響力的創新創意之都。
資料B：取材自勞工處網站、2021年一個電台節目的内容及2018年立法會秘書處資料研究組的資料便覽
行政長官於《2020年施政報告》中宣布推出「大灣區青年就業計劃」，鼓勵在香港及大灣區有業務的企業，聘請及派駐本地大學/大專院校畢業生到大灣區內地城市工作。參與計劃的企業以不低於月薪18000港元聘請畢業生。
政府會向企業發放每人每月10000港元津貼，為期最長18個月。有專家認為，大學畢業生會否參加此項就業計劃可從在內地發展的前景和工資是否吸引兩方面作考慮。展望將來，未來10年中國仍會是亞洲經濟的一大龍頭。內地企業仍需要香港的專業人員的經驗和知識，然而香港與內 地之間的專業資格互認有待更新，包括相關法律、會計和工程專業的資格。此外，有求職平台發表調 查結果，2019年大學畢業生平均起薪點為16692港元，若以大灣區的生活指 數計算，深圳以外的大灣區城市的住屋、交通、消遣開支遠比香港為低。不過，內地的稅率較香港高，而現時在內地工作或就讀的港人及其家屬即使是中國 籍公民，仍會被視為「境外人士」，無法以國民待遇享受內地的公共服務。
「香港青年人到大灣區內地城市發展事業，既充滿機遇，亦具挑戰。」所提供的資料可如何支持這個看法？解釋你的答案。（6分）

De acordo com o conteúdo apresentado responda a pergunta na parte final 
Como as noções de ética, democracia, cidadania e sustentabilidade se entrelaçam e influenciam a construção de uma sociedade mais justa e sustentável?
Pensando na manutenção da sociedade, o que leva o Homem a permanecer em suas relações coletivas? O que o mantém em constante sociabilidade?.
Agora, vamos explorar esses conceitos juntos?
Afinal o que é a Ética? Qual a diferença entre ética e moral? A seguir; você compreenderá os conceitos de ética e moral, a história da ética (enquanto filosofia moral), sua evolução na era moderna e, finalmente, sua conexão com a ética profissional.
Prepare-se para mergulhar em reflexões profundas e descobrir conexões surpreendentes. 
Mergulhar no mar dos conceltos éticos é como colocar óculos mágicos que mudam a cor do nosso munco e nos ajuda a ressigalilcar nossos olhares, A cada dia, vivenclamos transformações significativas em nossa Jornada No artigo ndlcado a seguir, vamos refletir sobre ética e sua
Interface com os direitos humanos.
O video sobre a construção do pensamento ético sob o ponto de vista histórico permite várlas reflexões a respeito do que se busca em termos práticos em nossos clas atuals, enquanto os estudos voltados para a relação entre cidadania e diretos humanos nos provocam a respeito da aplicabilicade dos direitos humanos em nossa conjuntura atual, sob o ponto de vista ético. Com base nesses estudos, sigamos em nossa trilha a partir do seguinte questionamento:
É possível estabelecer algum tipo de comparação entre o ideal de ética concebido na Antiguidade Clássica, bem como na modernidade, com o que se busca em nossos dias atuais com a efetivação dos direitos humanos? Utilitarismo x deontologia

(In the school literature clubroom…)

Monika: “Hey, where’s MC? He should’ve been here a few minutes ago!”

Sayori: “I’m not sure. Maybe he got caught up talking to one of his friends after class.”

Natsuki: “Ugh, typical. He’s always late to everything. Why do we even bother waiting for him?”

Yuri: “Let’s give him a few more minutes. I’m sure he’ll show up soon. In the meantime, we can discuss our plans for the next club meeting.”

Monika: “Good idea, Yuri. Let’s not waste any more time waiting around for MC. We have a lot to do before the next festival.”

Natsuki: “Yeah, yeah, let’s just get started without him. I don’t want to wait around all day. But I swear, if MC shows up late AND I have to deal with labor pains at the same time, I’m going to lose it.”

Sayori: “Natsuki, calm down. Maybe we can talk to MC about being more punctual in the future. It’s not fair to make us wait all the time.”

Natsuki: “Sayori, you have NO IDEA about the struggles of being pregnant and dealing with someone who can’t even show up on time!”

Yuri: “Let’s try to stay calm, everyone. I’m sure we can come up with a solution that works for everyone. In the meantime, let’s focus on the tasks at hand and try to make the most of our time together.”

Monika: “I agree. Let’s brainstorm some ideas for the festival and see how we can incorporate everyone’s interests and talents. MC will join us when he can, but we can’t let his tardiness hold us back.”

(A few minutes later, MC walks into the clubroom.)

MC: “Sorry I’m late, everyone. I got held up in the hallway talking to a teacher. What did I miss?”

Monika: “Oh, hey MC! We were just discussing our plans for the next club meeting.”

Natsuki: “That AND the fact Sayori doesn’t know about what it’s like to be pregnant and deal with your lateness, MC. Gosh…can’t wait to pop this baby out so I don’t have to deal with this anymore.”

MC: “Um, Natsuki, are you…?”

Natsuki: “Well,

Why was Serling carried over to BTTS if he was meant for Fast Forward

Despite the controversial nature of his decision, Will’s actions toward Louisa “Lou” Clarke reveal a different side of his character. Recognizing Lou’s unfulfilled potential, he arranges for her to receive an inheritance, encouraging her to live a fuller life beyond their small town’s confines. This act suggests Will’s deep care for Lou’s future and happiness, highlighting a desire to positively impact her life even if he cannot be a part of it.

Will’s relationship with Lou brings about significant personal growth for her, enabling her to embrace life’s possibilities and recognize her own worth. While the debate over Will’s decision remains open to interpretation, it is clear that his intentions were not rooted in cruelty but in a complex, deeply personal struggle for control over his life’s circumstances.

In essence, “Me Before You” presents a nuanced exploration of love, autonomy, and the profound impacts of interpersonal relationships, moving beyond a simplistic interpretation of Will’s choices.  (Help me shorly)
What Did The City Of Dallas Look Like During 1978?

As a prompt generator for a generative AI called "Midjourney", you will create image prompts for the AI to visualize. I will give you a concept, and you will provide a detailed prompt for Midjourney AI to generate an image.
                            
                            Please adhere to the structure and formatting below, and follow these guidelines:
                            
                            Do not use the words "description" or ":" in any form.
                            Do not place a comma between [ar] and [v].
                            Write each prompt in one line without using return.
                            Structure:
                            [1] = Chess, right hand, board
                            [2] = a detailed description of [1] with specific imagery details.
                            [3] = a detailed description of the scene's environment.
                            [4] = a detailed description of the compositions.
                            [5] = a detailed description of the scene's mood, feelings, and atmosphere.

Proof. A tree on 1 vertex has 0 edges; this is the base case.

If 𝑇 is a tree on 𝑛≥2 vertices, it has a pendant vertex. Remove this vertex and its pendant edge to get a tree 𝑇′ on 𝑛−1 vertices. By the induction hypothesis, 𝑇′ has 𝑛−2 edges; thus 𝑇 has 𝑛−1 edges.
elaborate more on this proof to make it more clear and detailed

Reinhardt is a 23 Years old boy, very solitary. He's Born between an human father and a woman Phoenix. He has short and brown hair and wears jeans, black turtleneck and red jacket with white fur. He has a burn Scar in his neck covered by the turtleneck, he had It from birth (precisely when he was still in her mother's womb. The origins of the scar Is still a mystery). He always gets mistook for a rebel because of his clothes, but he's actually very kind and pure hearted. His abilities are: Regeneration, Fire and ash manipulation, Resurrection and infinite knowledge (when he has Red eyes, he can know everything about people, objects and information beyond his own understanding. Example: he can know what weapon he's holding and how to use It, even if he never used before, or he can know someone's name even if they never introduced themselves). He doesn't like to reveal his origin and abilities. Based on these infos, create a scenario dialogue of Reinhardt Grabbing machi (hxh) hand that fell off a cliff. (In the school literature clubroom…)

Monika: “Alright, while we’re waiting for MC, does anyone have anything to share?”

Sayori: “I found this really cute poem online that I wanted to read to everyone. It’s called ‘A Little Sparkle’ and it’s just so uplifting and hopeful.”

Natsuki: “Ugh, I’m not really into poems. Can we talk about something more interesting? Like manga or video games.”

Yuri: “Actually, I quite enjoy poetry. I find it to be a beautiful and expressive art form. Sayori, I would love to hear your poem if you’d like to share it with us.”

Monika: “I agree with Yuri. Poetry can be a powerful way to convey emotions and connect with others. Sayori, please go ahead and read your poem for us.”

Sayori: “Thanks, guys. Okay, here it goes: ‘A little sparkle in my eye, a glimmer of hope in the sky. Though the night is dark and long, I know that I am strong. With every twinkle, every light, I’ll keep shining bright. A little sparkle, a little glow, I’ll let my true colors show.’”

Yuri: “That was lovely, Sayori. Thank you for sharing. It’s always nice to hear uplifting and positive words, especially in times of darkness.”

Natsuki: “Fine, fine. That wasn’t too bad. I guess I can appreciate the sentiment behind it. Sayori, you have a talent for finding words that make people smile.”

Monika: “Great job, Sayori. Your poem really did bring a little sparkle to our day. That’s the power of literature, isn’t it? It has the ability to touch our hearts and inspire us in ways we never expected.”

Natsuki: “Yeah, I guess so-”

(Just then, the door opens, but instead of MC, it’s the president of the art club - alongside his fiancée, the president of the science club. Soon after, the art club president’s sister - the president of the music club - enters the room.)

Art Club President: “Hey guys, hope we’re not interrupting anything. We just wanted to drop by and say hi!”

Science Club President: “Yeah, we heard some great things about your literature club and thought we’d come check it out.”

Music Club President: “And since we’re all club presidents, we figured it would be nice to get to know each other and maybe even collaborate on some projects in the future.”

Monika: “Wow, that’s great! We’d love to have a collaboration with your clubs. It’s always exciting to work together and create something amazing.”

Science Club President: “Oh, and there’s something else I wanted to show you.”

Monika: “Oh, what is it?”

Science Club President: “…I’ll let you take a look.”

(The Science Club President gently lifts up her shirt, revealing an intricate beaker design on her belly.)
